description: Homemade pancakes using only raw ingredients. No flavored powders (aka: sawdust)!

directions.step: In a bowl mix the flour, sugar, baking soda, baking powder, salt.
Mix in the milk, oil, eggs.
Pour heated water in a small bowl and place the syrup bottle inside to warm it up.
Pour about 1/3-1/2 cup batter onto hot non-stick frying pan or griddle and let cook until bubbles have come out of the whole top surface of the pancake.
Flip the pancake with a spatula.
Stack onto a warm plate covered with a clean towel to keep warm while you make the rest of the pancakes.
Repeat the previous 3 steps for each pancake.
Enjoy a homemade stack of pancakes with syrup! (also try eating the pancakes with fruit, like strawberries, blueberries, etc...)
